com.microblink.ocr

Class RandomScanElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microblink.ocr.RandomScanElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class RandomScanElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    This class holds a combination of parser settings, parser name (which is important for obtaining scan result), parser group and parser title (shown in UI).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • setOptional

        public void setOptional(boolean optional)
        Sets the flag that indicates whether this scan element is optional, which means that the result can be returned without scanning this element. By default, this flag is set to false and the scan element is mandatory.
        Parameters:
        optional - If set to true scan element is optional, otherwise it is mandatory.

      • getParserGroup

        public java.lang.String getParserGroup()

      • setParserGroup

        public void setParserGroup(java.lang.String parserGroup)
        Sets the parser group for parser that is responsible for this scan element. Parser groups contain one or more parsers and are responsible for merging required OCR engine options of each parser in group and performing OCR only once and then letting each parser in group to parse the data. Each parser has its own OCR engine options that are the best for it to perform OCR on image. If all parsers are in the same parser group, recognition will be faster, but sometimes merged OCR engine options may cause that some parsers are unable to extract valid data from the scanned text. Putting each parser into its own group will give best accuracy, but will perform OCR of image for each parser which can consume a lot of processing time. By default, all parsers will be placed in the same parser group (if this method is not used).
        Parameters:
        parserGroup - parser group for parser that is responsible for this scan element
